trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Ripon
There were no other sightings in Ripon on or around June 26th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWe walked out the front door as usual to tke the dogs for a short walk.Jeanine noticed the object first and pointed it out to me,so we watched it travel I'm going to say about 3 times the speed of any jet plane then it briefly became a glowing ball or it took off and it was gone.The sky's were partly cloudy but there was no obstruction of view for the object for a ways,and yet it had disapeared. At first I would have thought it was a meteor but the almost perfect round sphere I seen before it disapeared negated that idea. Our feelings were that it was not a meteor or anything we have ever seen or heard of,amusingly enough it reminded me of when Captain Kirk would put the Enterprise in warp drive.
Summary: a star like object traveling straight and fast became a globe or glowing sphere then disappeared
